agents.localModel

Class LocalModelFirstExp

  • java.lang.Object
    • agents.Agent
      • agents.SystemAgent
        • agents.localModel.LocalModelAgent
          • agents.localModel.LocalModelFirstExp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class LocalModelFirstExp
extends LocalModelAgent
implements java.io.Serializable
    A simple local model which uses only the value of the first experiment. Useful for output like integer.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
